An AFP report on the Indian airstrikes s: 3. The Bengali language caption in the misleading post states that the India-Pakistan war has begun and the people of Kashmir are moving to safer places.
The footage used in the misleading Faceb: titled "Run in the Himalaya || यार्सा खोजनेहरु || yarsagumba ||" which has no relation to the claim about people fleeing Kashmir due to war.
